cells.data:
Found that the issue I had in objective-c is the same for swift. Cannot store structs in iCloud as I could not store structs in NSCoding before. Had to convert the structs to NSData objects, store them in iCloudn and then convert them back when I read them back in.

Found some code using an extension online that seems to work.

Was going to avoid using structs, but have found that they do have their uses, and is worth the work to use them.
